entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Risk of freezing drizzle late this afternoon. Blowing snow at times this morning. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Sunday 9 April 2023
